data-definition.struct-type: this is a union in bay12 but they're both the same type so why bother

int32_t.name: overall_pop_capacity
int32_t.comment: all vaults, no others seen, always 100

int32_t.name: wg_build_work_days
int32_t.comment: all towers, no others. Seed is a guess based on the very large numbers

data-definition.struct-type:
bay12: SITE_ARCHITECTURE_CHANGE_FLAG_*
varies based on type

bay12: active_insurrectionst

bay12: WG_QUEST_POSTING_FLAG_*

stl-vector.comment: the circumstances of groups joining or leaving this culture

bay12: underground_infost

int32_t.comment: used for temple and mead hall
